zh: 她似乎对这个结果感到失望。

en: She looked out through the hole.
zh: 她从洞里向外看。

en: She acted in the play.
zh: 她在剧中表演。

en: She carried out the plan.
zh: 她执行了计划。

en: She felt like giving up the plan.
zh: 她感到想放弃这个计划。

en: She undertook the responsibility for the project.
zh: 她承担了该项目的责任。

en: She refused to accept the money.
zh: 她拒绝接受这笔钱。

en: She put the money in the bank.
zh: 她把钱存进了银行。

en: She found the money gone.
zh: 她发现钱不见了。

en: She managed to back through the narrow passage.
zh: 她设法倒退着穿过了狭窄的通道。

en: She managed to back up through the narrow driveway.
zh: 她设法倒车通过了狭窄的车道。

en: She visited the teacher.
zh: 她拜访了老师。

en: She fainted when she heard the terrible news.
zh: 她听到这个可怕的消息时晕倒了。

en: She asked how to cook the fish.
zh: 她问如何烹饪这条鱼。

en: She suggested that the customer buy a blue tie.
zh: 她建议顾客买一条蓝色的领带。

en: She derives her temper from her grandfather.
zh: 她的坏脾气遗传自她的祖父。

en: She put the machine in motion.
zh: 她启动了机器。

en: She half dragged, half carried the log.
zh: 她半拖半扛地搬运着木头。

en: She was taking a nap all the time.
zh: 她一直在午睡。

en: She hung the picture upside down.
zh: 她把画倒挂着。

en: She was required to step down in the office.
zh: 她被要求在办公室降职。

en: She has a 10 percent interest in the company.
zh: 她拥有公司百分之十的股份。

en: She is closely associated with the firm.
zh: 她与这家公司关系密切。

en: She needn't have come to the meeting.
zh: 她本不必来参加会议的。

en: She attended the meeting.
zh: 她参加了会议。

en: She didn't show up until the meeting was over.
zh: 直到会议结束她才出现。
